sentence: 57% in): PA Governor GOP Doug Mastriano* 293,046 (43%) Lou Barletta 151,709 (22%) Bill McSwain 103,520 (15%) *Race called for Mastriano More results here: https://t.co/4prVQOLzzB Decision Desk HQ (@DecisionDeskHQ) May 18, 2022 The GOP tweeted congratulations with regards to Mastriano and noted the party is "unified" behind him "to win in November."
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Trump's Endorsement Comes Through as State Sen. Doug Mastriano Wins PA Gubernatorial Primary
